channel.title: Please Help
channel.description:
I know you people must think I'm stupid or something but I honest to something(Atheism) I couldn't find a request section. I'm trying to put my server up but everything I tried didn't work. I portforwarded and made sure my IP was "static" with the "PFSetupStaticIPAdress" program. I tried downloading the PFPortChecker to see if my port was open but it just doesn't install right or something. So I couldn't check the port.
[b]Can a brave knight of the holiest helpith thee n00bestith?[/b]
I have Skype and Teamviewer7. (and OovoO) Or you could link me to a guide that works for Windows 7.

item.title: Please Help
item.dc:creator: @OwnerGriffin OwnerGriffin
item.description:
@OwnerGriffin wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:2, topic:449034”]You can check the port at: http://canyouseeme.org/

Also, requests are not allowed, which is why you couldn’t find a section. :)[/quote]

Thanks. The check port thing didn’t really help bcuz it told me my port wasn’t open lol.

ultimatepkvillage:

Have you tryed portforward.com search for your router model and then followed the runescape private server guide?

Yea I followed the guide on there along with the static IP and Portchecker guide. Why else would I put that I used those programs.

-edit- You guys are way more helpful then rune-serba…

Read full topic

item.title: Please Help
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:
